content: {"Name": "DUTCHESS OUTREACH FOOD PANTRY", "Entity_Id": 871, "Category": "Food Pantry", "Subcategory": "All Other - NYS Food Pantries", "Organization": "Dutchess Outreach", "More_Information": "Call to verify hours of operation and to see if an appointment is required. ID required for every family member including proof of address. Can only come once every 15 days; must be Dutchess County resident.", "Counties": ["Dutchess"], "Location": "In the back of the FPC, follow signs for the Food Pantry.", "Address": "29 North Hamilton Street - Suite 202", "City": "Poughkeepsie", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12601", "Phone": "845-454-3792, ext 3249", "Hours_of_Operation": "Every Monday 8:30AM 4:00PM \\n Every Tuesday 8:30AM 4:00PM \\n Every Wednesday 8:30AM 4:00PM \\n Every Thursday 8:30AM 4:00PM \\n Every Friday 8:30AM 4:00PM", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://dutchessoutreach.org/beverly-closs-food-pantry/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "41.7040662", "Longitude": "-73.921268", "Last_Updated": "09-22-2023", "icon": "marker-C53E2A", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
